text:
Hi Team,

1. I have created public app in my developer account and installed with another developer test account.
2.  I can able to fetch the Auth token  and get the contract records from HubSpot.

3) I can able view my app in connected app section in Integrations-->Connectedapp. (Screen shot attached)

4) I created custom workflow actions based on the link document, but my app and my actions is not showing in workflow connected app.

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/automation/custom-workflow-actions>


Please some one help me
Team, I resolved this issue.  published flag updated.

Hello everybody,
I am looking for some help here. We are on Pro account.
Through workflows, I would like to trigger an email sending to every contact linked to transactions/deals matching specific characteristics such as pipeline stage or customfield specific value.

Is this possible?
Hello Edouard, yes this is possible with workflow and might require custom code depending on your requirements.
What kind of workflow shoudl I chosse? a deal based?
What are the criteria to send an email? If it's a deal based criteria then it's deal based trigger.
If it's a change in a property of a contact then it's contact based trigger. It really depends on your requirements to send the email.
Ok I will try and come back to you if needed thank you

Is there not a way to set a numeric CRM object property from a custom event property? For comparison - (first screenshot) a numeric property just shows a number picker input while (second screenshot) a text property gives you a little inserter widget and allows you to set the property from the event property.

 It looks like you ˆcanˆ set properties via object insert on date fields. Numeric fields seem to be the only exception.
Hi Sebastian, we use hightouch to import data to HubSpot. I see that notes is an object you can sync to. Were you able to figure it out?

Hello everyone,

I am reaching out to inquire about custom workflow actions in HubSpot. Specifically, after creating the JSON file that outlines the custom action, I'm unsure about the next steps for hosting this file. Any guidance or direction on this matter would be greatly appreciated. Below is the document I've been consulting for this process.

Reference: [HubSpot Custom Workflow Actions Documentation](<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/automation/custom-workflow-actions>)

THank you in advance
